NotebookEncryption.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker notebook instances without KMS encryption enabled. Encrypting notebook instances protects sensitive data and code stored on the instance.
NotebookEncryption.shortDesc: Enable KMS encryption for notebook instances

DirectInternetAccess.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker notebook instances with direct internet access enabled. Disabling direct internet access improves security by routing traffic through your VPC.
DirectInternetAccess.shortDesc: Disable direct internet access for notebook instances
ref: [Connect a notebook instance to resources in a VPC]<https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/appendix-notebook-and-internet-access.html>

RootAccess.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker notebook instances with root access enabled. Disabling root access follows the principle of least privilege and improves security.
RootAccess.shortDesc: Disable root access for notebook instances
ref: [Control root access to a SageMaker notebook instance]<https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/nbi-root-access.html>

VPCConfiguration.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker notebook instances not deployed in a VPC. Deploying in a VPC provides network isolation and better security controls.
VPCConfiguration.shortDesc: Deploy notebook instances in a VPC
ref: [Connect a notebook instance to resources in a VPC]<https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/appendix-notebook-and-internet-access.html>

EndpointEncryption.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker endpoints without KMS encryption enabled. Encrypting endpoints protects model data and inference requests.

DataCaptureConfig.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker endpoints without data capture configured. Data capture helps with model monitoring and debugging.

AutoScaling.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker endpoints that may benefit from auto scaling configuration. Auto scaling helps handle varying inference loads efficiently.
AutoScaling.shortDesc: Consider configuring auto scaling for endpoints

ModelNetworkIsolation.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker models without VPC configuration. VPC configuration provides network isolation for better security.
ref: [Give SageMaker access to resources in your Amazon VPC]<https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/host-vpc.html>

ModelExecutionRole.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker models without proper execution role configuration. Proper IAM roles ensure secure access to resources.
ModelExecutionRole.shortDesc: Configure proper execution roles for models

ModelArtifacts.^description: You have {$COUNT} SageMaker models with improperly configured model artifacts. Model artifacts should be stored securely in S3.
ModelArtifacts.shortDesc: Ensure model artifacts are properly stored in S3
